FILE: cm056110v11.0.txt
DYAD: St. Lucia - Guyana

PS: 19790222-20209999 0.75

PS-UPDATE2020:

PSNOTES: Contiguous by less than 400 miles of water, but St. Lucia has been Caribbean Common Market member since independence. Relationship is 0.75 due to mutual membership in CARICOM

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20220216
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20220216
